abstract: Stephen Holden reviews cabaret show Marilyn in Fragments, performed by singer Marissa Mulder, at Laurie Beechman Theater.

headline.print_headline: Fearsome Mood Swings of a Wounded Waif
headline.main: Review: Marilyn Monroe ‘in Fragments,’ Eerily Exposed

snippet: Marissa Mulder’s cabaret-style theater piece at the Laurie Beechman Theater depicts the star as a wounded waif who swings between fear and defiance.
lead_paragraph: Marissa Mulder’s cabaret-style theater piece at the Laurie Beechman Theater depicts the star as a wounded waif who swings between fear and defiance.
